reviewHighlights.text: Now seems to be the perfect time to review Slay the Spire. As we sit right now, during the Steam Winter Sale 2025, it is $2.49. That is a total steal....
Slay the spire is a good game but be careful: the graphics are a bit outdated as well as the game engine.
